Material used.Description: The experiments were conducted using the Huh7 cell line and primary human hepatocytes.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased aggregation and reduced secretion of the p.Glu342Lys variant.
Reduced solubility and increased risk of liver disease for the p.Gln279Arg variant.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each condition.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type alpha-1 antitrypsin protein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector or mock transfection was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression levels above 80% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression levels below 50% of wild-type levels or significant aggregation observed.
